description: four nudes under a tree, with one standing figure at center; central seated nude has her hands held up to her head; greens, blue, brown and muted flesh tones; sketchy style
markings: on back, LRC, stamped twice in purple: COLLECTION/ A CLOT/ ATELIER
provenance: Auguste Clot Estate, Paris; Samuel Josefowitz, Lausanne and Whitchurch-on-Thames; (R. M. Light & Company, Inc., Santa Barbara, Calif.); sold to MIA, 2007.
title: Nymph Sitting under a Tree
